subject: Education

hook.text: In 1792, a woman argued that denying girls education made the whole nation weaker.

buildup.text: Mary Wollstonecraft's 'Vindication' said women seem inferior only because they're uneducated.

quiz.question: What was Wollstonecraft's central educational argument?
